p: The viscous liquid product was stored under inert atmosphere. 1H NMR (800 MHz, CD 3OD) δ (ppm): 8.89 (s, attenuated); 7.59 (s, 1H, CH 3NCHC HN); 7.52 (s, 1H, CH 3NC HCHN); 7.06 (d, J = 1.76 Hz, 1H, SCC HCO); 6.75 (dd, J = 8.76, 1.92 Hz, 1H, SCCHCOC H); 6.7 (d, J = 8.80 Hz, 1H, SCCOC H); 4.18 ( t, J = 7.42 Hz, 2H, NC H 2(CH 2) 2CH 3); 3.90 (s, 3H, NC H 3); 1.84 (pent, J = 7.49 Hz, 2H, NCH 2C H 2CH 2CH 3); 1.35 (sext, J = 7.52 Hz, 2H, N(CH 2) 2C H 2CH 3); 0.97 ( t, J = 7.48 Hz, 3H, N(CH 2) 3C H 3). 13C NMR (200 MHz, CD 3OD) δ (ppm): 150.8, 147.96, 137.84, 129.86, 124.92, 123.63, 120.76, 118.82, 114.1, 50.58, 36.46, 33.09, 20.44, 13.78. IR: 3150 cm −1–2870 cm −1 (aromatic and aliphatic C–H), 1610 cm −1 (C=C), 1162 cm −1 (C=N), and 1570 cm −1 (C–N), 1230 cm −1 (S=O), 1072 cm −1 (S–O). Melting point: -41 °C. Mass spectrum (Quad +ve) m/ z: 138.89 ((BMIM) +), −ve) m/ z: 189.8 ((HSQ) −).
